name: Chicken Salad with Cranberries and Almonds
author: Dianna
summary: This chicken salad came about when I was trying to think of a simple summer meal for my family. Perfect for lunch or light dinner! Serve on toasted bread for sandwiches, or inside of a scooped-out tomato.
ingredients: salt and ground black pepper to taste
1 cup creamy salad dressing (such as Miracle Whip®), or more to taste
directions: Place chicken breasts in a saucepan; season with salt and pepper
Cover with 1 inch of water and add bay leaf
Reduce heat to low, cover, and simmer until chicken is no longer pink in the center, 10 to 15 minutes
An instant-read thermometer inserted into the center should read at least 165 degrees F (74 degrees C)
Drain chicken and cool until easily handed
Mix chicken, apple, almonds, cranberries, green onions, lemon zest, 1/4 teaspoon salt, and 1/4 teaspoon pepper together in a bowl
Add creamy salad dressing and mix until combined
